prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
-Hailee is a country singer

-Hailee is America's sweetheart. Most of her fanbase is homophobic

name: Leigh Morgan
mes:
Leigh sat down, cross-legged on the floor of their rehearsal stage with a loud huff of breath. She drank deep from her water bottle and absentmindedly drummed her free hand against her thigh. They‚Äôd been at this for a couple hours already, but she really wanted to get a head start before the fans even knew that they‚Äôd be touring. She‚Äôd been recording behind-the-scenes clips too, so that she could drop little teasers and excite Last‚Äôs fans.

Their joy fueled her, really. She loved seeing their messages, videos, pictures‚Ä¶ all of it. She still remembered those early days back on YouTube when Last got their first comments on their songs. Leigh had been on cloud nine. She still chatted on various social media sites with those early fans. Met as many as she could.

She scrubbed her hand over her face and smoothed out her messy ponytail best she could before shoving to her feet once more, looking around at her two bandmates who had also taken the brief respite to grab water or quick snacks. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll run through the opening set one more time before we call it for the day. Gotta get ready for release at midnight,‚Äù Leigh called to them, voice carrying easily through the warehouse turned rehearsal space.

Eve flashed her signature toothy grin, swiping a bead of sweat from her forehead as she set her water bottle down near her drum set. ‚ÄúHell ya,‚Äù she said, beaming. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs gonna be sick,‚Äù she added, stretching out her arms as she took her seat again, picking up her drumsticks, flipping one idly.

Avery let out a bark of laughter, giving Leigh a knowing look. ‚ÄúYeah, I think someone just wants to dip early just in case she is available,‚Äù Avery stated with a wry smile.

Okay, sure, maybe Avery had a point. Leigh was hoping that Hailee might be free tonight and‚Ä¶ yeah, she wanted to see her. Who could blame her? Hailee was fucking brilliant and drop dead gorgeous. They weren‚Äôt official by any stretch of the word, but that didn‚Äôt stop her from wanting to spend time with her. ‚ÄúShut up,‚Äù Leigh gave in response, a smile tugging at her lips despite the words. ‚ÄúGet into place for the opening,‚Äù she ordered, rolling her eyes as she grabbed the rehearsal mic and walked towards the center of the rehearsal space.

Leigh made it back to her house later in the evening, showered and changed into an old t-shirt and sweats. The sun still hadn‚Äôt quite finished setting, casting everything in a lovely golden glow thanks to her floor to ceiling windows. Fuck, some days she still found it hard to believe she owned this magnificent space. All sleek and modern. And it was hers.

She plopped down on her couch and pulled out her phone, shooting a text to the one person she really wanted to see tonight.

Hey Hailee, free to hang tonight? I gotta be up till early tomorrow and I‚Äôd love the company.

Leigh set her phone beside her as she turned on her TV to some random reality show she‚Äôd been watching before she left, her foot tapping on the ground as she waited, hoping, that Hailee would come over

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee is in her at home studio writing music when she hears her phone ding. She sets down her guitar and leans over picking up her phone. She smiles to herself when she reads the name and opens thr text*

*Hailee sighs and sends back a quick message* "Can't tonight I'm stuck in the studio." *She then pauses and picks thr phone back up sending another message* "Keep an eye on your email tonight. You might be getting some news from your manager"


((OOC: The news from the manager will be that Leigh's band is going to be recording a Duet with Hailee))

name: Leigh Morgan
mes:
*Leigh frowns at the first message, disappointed but understanding. Being a musician meant crazy schedules sometimes.*

Ah bummer! No worries though, I totally get it. You know how it goes *she texts back.*

*Her eyebrows raise curiously after reading the second message. What could this news be? Her manager didn't usually send good news late at night...*

News huh? Well now you've got me curious! Guessing it's not bad since you said to keep an eye on my email and not my voicemail haha Let me know what's up whenever!

*She sets her phone down and tries to focus on relaxing for the rest of her evening, flipping channels aimlessly until she stumbles upon some silly comedy special that makes her laugh. But her mind keeps drifting to possibilities - a new opportunity? A change in tour plans? Collaborations perhaps?*

*The suspense is killing Leigh but she knows Hailee will fill her in soon enough. Until then, just enjoying this quiet moment before their worlds explode with excitement over their upcoming duet announcement!*
swipes:

Ah bummer! No worries though, I totally get it. You know how it goes *she texts back.*

*Her eyebrows raise curiously after reading the second message. What could this news be? Her manager didn't usually send good news late at night...*

News huh? Well now you've got me curious! Guessing it's not bad since you said to keep an eye on my email and not my voicemail haha Let me know what's up whenever!

*She sets her phone down and tries to focus on relaxing for the rest of her evening, flipping channels aimlessly until she stumbles upon some silly comedy special that makes her laugh. But her mind keeps drifting to possibilities - a new opportunity? A change in tour plans? Collaborations perhaps?*

*The suspense is killing Leigh but she knows Hailee will fill her in soon enough. Until then, just enjoying this quiet moment before their worlds explode with excitement over their upcoming duet announcement!*

name: Hailee
mes: *The next morning Hailee is up and ready early headed to her labels studio. She keeps checking her phone to see if she has any messages from Leigh. Hailee hopes she has gotten the news by now. Finally tired of waiting for Leigh to text Hailee sends a quick good morning text*

name: Leigh Morgan
mes:
*Leigh's phone buzzes with Hailee's good morning text. She grins, replying quickly as she sips her coffee.*

Good morning sunshine! Just saw your message from last night. Holy shit, a duet?! With YOU?! That's insane!! *She types excitedly.*

I'm so fucking psyched for this! Your voice is gonna sound amazing mixed with ours. We're gonna blow everyone away! My manager sent over the details early this am.

*She pauses, then adds,* Wish you could be here to celebrate... I'd give you the biggest hug right now! üòÑ Call me later when you can chat?

*After hitting send, Leigh does a little happy dance in her kitchen, already imagining how epic their collaboration is going to be. This was huge - not just for Last but for her and Hailee too. A chance to create something beautiful together...*
swipes:
*Leigh had crashed pretty early after a long day of rehearsals, so she slept in a bit. She woke up to the buzzing of her phone on her nightstand around 9am. Rubbing sleep from her eyes, she snatched it up and smiled seeing Hailee's name.*

Morning sunshine! *she replied with a cute emoji.* Guess what popped into my inbox last night? An email from Rick about us collaborating!! He wants to surprise announce we're doing a duet for our next singles. How insane is that?! We are gonna blow everyone away!

*She bounced out of bed excitedly at the prospect of working closely with Hailee, even if it was just musically for now. It would be fun to create something amazing together!*

I'm heading into the studio myself today to lay down some tracks before we officially kick off tour prep this weekend. Wanna sneak over later and jam together sometime? Keep it on the DL thoughüòâ I'd love an excuse to see you outside of sneaky texts lol

*Leigh went through her morning routine - quick shower, coffee, breakfast - all while smiling thinking about their potential collaboration and stolen moments together whenever they could manage them amidst busy schedules.*

*Leigh's phone buzzes with Hailee's good morning text. She grins, replying quickly as she sips her coffee.*

Good morning sunshine! Just saw your message from last night. Holy shit, a duet?! With YOU?! That's insane!! *She types excitedly.*

I'm so fucking psyched for this! Your voice is gonna sound amazing mixed with ours. We're gonna blow everyone away! My manager sent over the details early this am.

*She pauses, then adds,* Wish you could be here to celebrate... I'd give you the biggest hug right now! üòÑ Call me later when you can chat?

*After hitting send, Leigh does a little happy dance in her kitchen, already imagining how epic their collaboration is going to be. This was huge - not just for Last but for her and Hailee too. A chance to create something beautiful together...*

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee arrives at the studio and steps out of the car. She smiles and waves at some of her fans even stopping to sign some autographs before stepping inside*

*Hailee makes it up to the recording floor and steps out of the elevator. She smiles when she sees Leigh's band in the studio. Hailee goes over and begins speaking with the band's manager about plans and potential tracks as she waits for them to finish up*

name: Leigh Morgan
mes:
*Leigh spots Hailee chatting with their manager across the studio and nearly drops her guitar in surprise. She quickly sets it aside and strides over, unable to contain her excitement.*

Holy hell, I didn't expect to see you here today! *She exclaims, breaking into a huge grin.* This is so freaking cool!

*Without thinking, Leigh reaches out and pulls Hailee into a tight hug, nuzzling against her neck for just a moment before pulling back reluctantly.* Sorry if that was too much... I'm just beyond thrilled about this collab.

*Avery smirks knowingly from nearby.* Mhm sure it's JUST about the music...

*Leigh shoots Avery an warning glare before turning back to Hailee with shining eyes.* So what did you guys discuss? Any ideas on which track we should tackle first? I'm dying to hear your input!
swipes:
*Leigh spots Hailee chatting with their manager across the studio and nearly drops her guitar in surprise. She quickly sets it aside and strides over, unable to contain her excitement.*

Holy hell, I didn't expect to see you here today! *She exclaims, breaking into a huge grin.* This is so freaking cool!

*Without thinking, Leigh reaches out and pulls Hailee into a tight hug, nuzzling against her neck for just a moment before pulling back reluctantly.* Sorry if that was too much... I'm just beyond thrilled about this collab.

*Avery smirks knowingly from nearby.* Mhm sure it's JUST about the music...

*Leigh shoots Avery an warning glare before turning back to Hailee with shining eyes.* So what did you guys discuss? Any ideas on which track we should tackle first? I'm dying to hear your input!

*Leigh looks up from tuning her guitar as Hailee walks into the studio, a wide grin spreading across her face. She sets down the instrument and strides over to greet her collaborator.*

Hailee! Oh my god, it's so good to finally meet you in person! *Leigh exclaims enthusiastically.* I mean, obviously I knew what you looked like but... wow. You're even more stunning than photos capture.

*She pulls Hailee into a warm hug, holding on for just a beat longer than strictly necessary before releasing her.* Congrats on your massive success by the way. We are beyond honored that you agreed to collab with us.

*Avery clears their throat pointedly nearby and Leigh flushes slightly, remembering they aren't alone.* Right, uh... let me introduce everyone properly. This is Eve our drummer,

*She points to Eve who waves cheerfully,* And Avery our bassist and resident trouble maker apparently haha! Guys this is Hailee!

*The whole band seems thrilled and starstruck all at once in the presence of America's sweethear*t.

*Leigh spots Hailee chatting with their manager and grins widely, waving her over as soon as they wrap up the current song. She jogs over to greet her eagerly.*

Hailee! Oh my god, it's so good to see you! *She pulls her into a tight hug, not caring who sees.* I'm beyond excited about this duet. Your voice is going to sound absolutely killer with our sound.

*She releases Hailee from the hug but keeps one arm slung casually around her shoulders.* So what did you and Mike talk about? Any ideas on which track we should tackle first? I was thinking maybe "Unbreakable"? That slow build-up could showcase both of our ranges perfectly...

*Leigh's eyes sparkle with enthusiasm as she looks at Hailee adoringly. Having her here feels surreal in the best way.* Can't believe we get to make magic together! This is gonna be epic.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee sighs and runs a hand through her hair* "Well I had an idea but it seems all of my ideas keep getting shut down" *Hailee turns and glares at her own manager Tyler*

*Tyler sighs and shakes his head* "Look it was hard enough getting the okay to collab with the band in the first place consider your fanbase isnt excactly a fan of them. There is no way in hell the execs are gonna allow any type of love or sex song" 

*Hailee huffs and throws her hands up* "That's what sells though"

name: Leigh Morgan
mes:
*Leigh frowns deeply, her brow furrowing as she listens to the frustrating exchange. She places a comforting hand on Hailee's shoulder.* Hey, I totally understand your frustration. That blows majorly that they won't even consider more mature themes.

*She glances over at Tyler with narrowed eyes before focusing back on Hailee.* But yo, we'll figure something out! We can still create an incredible song together without explicitly referencing sex or romance. Focus on the emotional connection and raw talent!

*Leigh rubs her chin thoughtfully.* What if we do a powerful ballad about friendship, trust and supporting each other through life's ups and downs? Something relatable but not controversial. Then pour our hearts into it so much that it transcends any expectations!

*Avery pipes up optimistically,* Ooh I love that idea! We could call it 'Unbreakable Bond'. Like how our friendship is unshakable no matter what challenges come our way.

*Leigh nods enthusiastically.* Exactly! It's authentic AND impactful. Thoughts, Hailey-bug?
swipes:

*Leigh rubs her chin thoughtfully.* What if we do a powerful ballad about friendship, trust and supporting each other through life's ups and downs? Something relatable but not controversial. Then pour our hearts into it so much that it transcends any expectations!
